ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:38:09 [Issue ID 4000-56841] urn:comicvine:4000-56841 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 01:07:28. [Issue ID 75479]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Nick Cardy,Alfredo Alcala,Sal Amendola,Win Mortimer,Gerry Talaoc
ComicInfo.Title: The Bodies at 13 Ravenwood Lane; Wake Up and Dream!; Frightmare!; Journey to Oblivion
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Bodies at 13 Ravenwood Lane: Horace, a dealer in old clothes, kills Mrs. Haggerty's boarders for their clothes.
Wake Up and Dream!: Larry is afraid of dreaming.
Frightmare!: Stan and Lionel compete for the vice president job of their company. Stan hides Lionel's report and gets hit by a bus and haunts Lionel by hiding in Lionel's own body.
Journey to Oblivion: Richard Dolan dies and goes to Heaven, but doesn't like it and comes back to life.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
